name: emby
tagline: A media server for organizing and streaming personal video, music, and photos
description: Emby is a media server platform that organizes and streams personal video, music, and photos to many devices. It offers apps for TVs and mobiles, a web interface, user profiles, and features like live TV and DVR for home media setups.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Automatically organize video, music, and photos. Beautiful library management

features.title: Multi-Device Sync
features.description: Apps for TVs, phones, and web browsers. Watch anywhere, anytime

features.title: User Profiles
features.description: Separate accounts with personalized recommendations. Family-friendly setup

features.title: Live Tv & Dvr
features.description: Record and watch live television. Complete home entertainment

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Complete control over your media server. No subscription fees ever
